TopicTitle: Munar surface refueling truck with AGU coupling.

Articles.Content:
Hi everybody. Long time player, first time poster. Just wanted to show off my Munar surface refueling truck in the process of refueling a heavy lander by grappling with the AGU. Much much easier than using docking ports. No more stranded landers.

You can even link them together to make rover trains (set the AGU to free) but my computer lags badly if I use more than three.
